abstractContent.text: A combined alphabetic list of members oft he Associ-a ti on and persons mentioned in the 1974 and 1975 sets of AJCL, both co n tr i bu to r sand authors of abstracted papers, is in preparation.

A new scheme of topical categories is being prepared by cluster analysis of responses from members, and w i ll be used as headings on a set of index guide cards which will l i st a rt i cl e s , abstracts and members by to pi c.
The whole package will be distributed about a month after this issue.
